tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE employee_certifications (
    employee_id INT,
    certification_name VARCHAR(100),
    certification_date DATE,
    certification_expiry_date DATE,
    certification_number VARCHAR(20),
    certification_issuer VARCHAR(100),
    license_name VARCHAR(100),
    license_number VARCHAR(20),
    license_expiry_date DATE,
    qualification_name VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE licenses (
    license_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    license_name VARCHAR(50),
    issue_date DATE,
    expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE EmployeeCertifications (
    employee_id INT NOT NULL,
    certification_id INT NOT NULL,
    certification_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    issue_date DATE NOT NULL,
    expiration_date DATE NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (employee_id, certification_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EmployeeLicenses (
    employee_id INT NOT NULL,
    license_id INT NOT NULL,
    license_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    issue_date DATE NOT NULL,
    expiration_date DATE NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (employee_id, license_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EmployeeQualifications (
    employee_id INT NOT NULL,
    qualification_id INT NOT NULL,
    qualification_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    completion_date DATE NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (employee_id, qualification_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ComplianceDetails (
    employee_id INT NOT NULL,
    compliance_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    compliance_status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    last_checked_date DATE NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (employee_id, compliance_type)
);
